name: unscrupulously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is dishonest or unfair, in order to get what you want : A very small number of medical practitioners unscrupulously exploit the system for financial reward. He accused the media of unscrupulously trying to exploit this misfortune.
More examplesFewer examplesSome of them are trying to boost their profits by unscrupulously lowering the standards of products.She worked for an unscrupulously partisan newspaper. They alleged that the party had unscrupulously allied themselves with the forces of nationalism.
